lead_paragraph: The Trump Organization is pulling back on its promotion of the president-elect and his daughter Ivanka as the business takes steps to avoid conflicts of interest.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and ERIC LIPTON

headline.main: As Trump Heads to White House, His Face Recedes From Other Properties
headline.print_headline: As Trump Nears White House, His Face Fades From Other Properties

snippet: The Trump Organization is pulling back on its promotion of the president-elect and his daughter Ivanka as the business takes steps to avoid conflicts of interest....
